name: Kalendaediscordium
body:
# Kalendae Discordium

An improvement to the PHP DateTime class to include real honest discordian date formats.

This code is provided "as isn't". Do with it as you may, but please include a link back to this github repository, so I get to see what cool/dumb stuff was made with it.

If you make something cool/dumb with it, that'd be good too. If you improve it, send a pull request and I can add your work, so you can get glory, girls and lots and lots of spam.

Hail Eris.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
